channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Exchange Server 2019
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Exchange Server 2019

item.title: CVE-2019-1373|2024-08-04T18:13:30.472Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server%202019
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Exchange through the deserialization of metadata via PowerShell, aka 'Microsoft Exchange Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'.
